CanvasRenderingContext2DGlobalCompositeO.summary:
The
CanvasRenderingContext2D.globalCompositeOperation
property of the Canvas 2D API sets the type of compositing operation to apply when
drawing new shapes.

remarks.para: See also Compositing and clipping in the Canvas Tutorial.

CanvasRenderingContext2DGlobalCompositeO.value: A string identifying which of the compositing or blending mode operations to use.
